info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 1:22PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant County through 145 PM MDT... At 122 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Mangas Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cliff, Redrock, Mangas Springs, Riverside, Gila, Bill Evans Lake and Gila Middle Box. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
